org.springframework.boot.web.reactive.context

类 ReactiveWebServerInitializedEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • org.springframework.context.ApplicationEvent
        • org.springframework.boot.web.context.WebServerInitializedEvent
          • org.springframework.boot.web.reactive.context.ReactiveWebServerInitializedEvent
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable

    public class ReactiveWebServerInitializedEvent
extends WebServerInitializedEvent
    Event to be published after the ReactiveWebServerApplicationContext is refreshed and the WebServer is ready. Useful for obtaining the local port of a running server.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0.0

    • 方法详细资料

      • getApplicationContext

        public ReactiveWebServerApplicationContext getApplicationContext()
        从类复制的说明: WebServerInitializedEvent
        Access the application context that the server was created in. Sometimes it is prudent to check that this matches expectations (like being equal to the current context) before acting on the server itself.
        指定者:
        getApplicationContext 在类中 WebServerInitializedEvent
        返回:
        the applicationContext that the server was created from
